Headline: No Trains Between Jefferson Park and Rosemont
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between  Jefferson Park and Rosemont due to debris on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between  Jefferson Park and Rosemont due to debris on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • between O'Hare and Rosemont, and,
  • betweenJefferson Park and Forest Park, only.

Shuttle buses are available between Jefferson Park and Rosemont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
